In the corner, the mercenary Dracon stood alone, not one to be part of a cr=
owd. He sipped from his glass of energin in hand.  Dracon saw Krhinos walk =
into the Mess Hall, and instantly made a gesture by tipping his glass forwa=
rd in a salute.

"G'Day, Captain..." he said solemnly, "how fares our searc=
h, might I ask?"
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Nic 
  To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 02, 2003 9:33 PM
  Subject: The new C=
ontract


  "Captain Krhinos is requested in room 1000, Captain Krhinos"

 =
 The huge workman entered the elevator and punched a button. It took
  him =
straight at the top stair of the huge space station. He
  disembarked and w=
alked into the office of Tycoon, his entrepreneur boss.

  Tycoon: Hi Krhin=
os. Sit down please. You've got a new mission! Energon?

  Krhinos: Just a =
small glass, you know I'm trying to quit... So, what's
  the new deal? The =
Tripredacus again?

  Tycoon: Not this time. (He poured the liquid energon =
in two small
  glasses and handed one to his employee.) They've offered gre=
at
  contracts, but they're ending their invasion soon. They don't need any=

  more ore. (He sipped a little from his cup) This contractor wished to
  =
remain anonymous, but it's going to be one of our biggest offer yet.
  Basi=
cally, we have been given the mining rights for a whole planet!

  Krhinos =
nearly choked on his energon. A planet! StarDrill Inc would
  become the mo=
st profitable company in the whole system!

  Krhinos: You serious, Tyke?!?=
 A planet!? Which one just for fun?

  Tycoon smiled grimly.

  Tycoon: Ear=
th! We have the rights to mine Earth! The human cradle
  itself! (Seeing Kr=
hinos's unbelieving face, he held a hand up.) Now,
  now... It's the prehis=
toric Earth, not that rebellious headquarter of
  today's.

  Krhinos: What=
 are we looking for? Iron? Radium?

  Tycoon: All you can find! You get a f=
ull mobile mining base that you
  can keep in orbit, a small outpost on the=
 planet from which you can
  ship the resources, I'll even grant you that M=
ammoth Drill you love so
  much. In short, do your best! Oh... I almost for=
got... I got you a few
  mercenaries to bring along. They should be in the =
Mess Hall by now.
  Take 'em along. They'll help you a lot, it's on their c=
ontract. If it
  isn't, just pay them on the company's account.

  Krhinos:=
 Will do, Boss. Thanks a lot! I' make this mission pay up!

  The massive b=
ot stood up, finished his drink in a nano and saluted
  Tycoon one last tim=
e before going to the Mess Hall. It was the kind of
  bar where he'd expect=
 anything, from the lowly pleasure bots to the
  drunken brawls. He looked =
around, trying to find some relatively fresh
  mercs in the crowd...


    =
    Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is =
subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
